resources.string: Tap here to add a city
Add %s to your Home and Apps screens.
After you agree to all of the above, this message will not be shown again.
To use this feature, you need to allow permission in Settings.
Allow %s to access the following data:
A new version of %s is available.
A new version of %s is available.
Report sent. City name will be changed as soon as possible after verification.
"Get refreshed weather info every hour automatically. When this is on, you can't refresh manually."
"Get more frequent weather updates when you're driving, biking, running, or walking. When this is on, you can't refresh manually."
"Get more frequent weather updates when you're driving, biking, running, or walking."
Connect to a network to view weather information.
Connecting via mobile network may incur additional charges depending on your payment plan.
Your device’s location information will be sent to the content provider so that you can be provided with local weather information.
This service is temporarily not available. Please try again later.
Set the same location on the main screen?
A new version of %s is available.
Get up-to-date weather notifications for your location based on your daily usage patterns.
Customization Service improves your experience by personalizing your content in supported apps and services.
Allow %s to use network connections and access the following data:
Data will be transferred in the background when your phone is connected to a mobile network or WLAN.
"Can't use Weather widget after deleting Weather apps."
All cities will be deleted and weather information will not be displayed in widget.
The weather widget icon will be added to the application list.
WLAN connection required. Connect to WLAN and try again.
Double tap and hold, then drag to reorder.
Double tap and hold, then drag to reorder.
Double tap to go to website.
Item at position %d cannot be dragged.
Tap here to add, delete, and reorder locations. You can also add multiple widgets to show different locations on the Home screen.
Tap Manage locations at the bottom of this menu to add, delete, and reorder locations.
You can add more than one widget to the Home screen to show different locations at the same time.
In Easy mode, only your current city will be shown.
Unable to send report. Enter city name.
To view your local weather information, turn on Location and make sure the mode is set to %s.
Location is disabled. To view the weather forecast for your current location, tap SETTINGS, then enable Location.
To view local weather forecast, tap SETTINGS, then enable Location.
Get personalized content based on how you use your phone.
Get personalized content based on how you use your tablet.
get weather information, including your current location, from Weather
Heavy rain followed by intense heat
Heavy rain followed by intense heat
Heavy rain with some light rain

Your favorite location will be used to provide weather information in notifications, Calendar, Always On Display, and other connected services. You can change your favorite location in your location list.
Your favorite location will be used to provide weather information in notifications. You can change your favorite location in your location list.
Your favorite location will be used to provide weather information in notifications, Calendar, and other connected services. You can change your favorite location in your location list.
Add, delete, or set a location as your favorite.
To add the Weather widget to the Home screen:
To change the location or appearance of the widget, press and hold, then tap Settings.
Your favorite location is used in notifications, Calendar, and the Always On Display.
Press and hold a blank space on the Home screen, then tap Widgets.
Press and hold a widget to select it.
Search or swipe to find Weather.
Select a location for the widget.
Set the background color and transparency.
Slide your finger to choose a location, then lift your finger to place the widget. If you have more than one page on the Home screen, you can move to the edge of the screen to scroll left or right.
You can add more widgets to show the weather in different locations.
Allows the widget to find your current position.
Intense heat followed by heavy rain
Intense heat with some heavy rain
Life index values are not available in other countries.
Light rain followed by heavy rain
Light rain with some heavy rain
Location will be enabled and the Locating method will be set to %s.
The Locating method will be set to %s.
To show your local weather, Location will be turned on and set to %s.
To detect your location faster and more accurately, the Locating method will be set to %s.
Set the same location on the cover screen?
To view the weather for a location, enter a city name using the language set as the current system language, or touch and hold a location on the map.
Source: Weather center, Korea Environment Corporation, Weathernews Inc.
"- This widget's domestic weather information is based on Korean weather centre data."
Lock screen and S View Cover
Receive notifications about changes in the weather.
"Couldn't add cities. Connect to network and try again."
"Couldn't add location. Connect to a network and try again."
Updating weather information using mobile networks may result in additional charges depending on your payment plan.
Tap here to change the default weather location and manage all of your locations.
A new version of %s is available.
Stay up to date on current events by showing news on the Weather widget.
Stay up to date with the world by showing the latest headlines from %s on the Weather widget.
See the news and weather in one widget
The 5 things you need to know this morning
Double tap to view weather information for next city.
For the fastest and most accurate location detection, tap SETTINGS, then set the Locating method to GPS, Wi-Fi, and mobile networks.
For the fastest and most accurate location detection, tap SETTINGS, then set the Locating method to GPS and Wi-Fi.
To view your local weather information, turn on Location settings and make sure the mode is set to High accuracy.
Turn on Location to view the local forecast.
Weather information is updated automatically every %d hours. This may result in additional charges. You can change the refresh interval in the weather widget settings.
Weather information is updated automatically every hour. This may result in additional charges. You can change the refresh interval in the weather widget settings.
This service is only supported in %s.
Location: Used to search for weather information for the current location.
The following permission is optional. You can use the app without it, but some functions may be limited.
Double tap to view weather information for previous city.
"Couldn't restore weather info. Your previous weather information was set for a different country with a different service provider."
Tap here to restore weather data.
The maximum number of cities (%1$d) has been exceeded. Select up to %2$d cities, then tap DONE.
To get the best performance from Weather, turn on Allow background data usage and Allow app while Data saver on in Settings.
Function not supported in Demo mode.
To update weather information, tap SETTINGS, go to App info > Permissions, then allow the following permissions and try again:
The %s app is allowed permission to access the following:
Protect your private data and apps from phishing and other attacks by saving them in Secure Folder.
Select the size of icons, text, and controls.
The size of text on the home screen, quick settings panel, and other areas of the device may not be affected.
Swipe up or down with two fingers to scroll.
%s will be set as your favorite location. It will also be applied to notifications, Calendar, and Always On Display.
To change this setting, go to Location > Locating method in Settings.
To change this setting, go to Location in Settings.

If you agree to this, other functions or services whose only purpose is to provide localised weather information will also be granted this permission until you turn it off from Weather settings > Show weather information.

The location information will not be stored by us, and we will take proper security measures to protect the safety of your location information during the processing of your information. The weather forecast service is not provided by us. As your location information may be stored or processed by the weather forecast service provider, you may be subject to the service provider’s privacy policy.
Using mobile networks may result in additional charges depending on your payment plan.
I agree to the use of my location information and to change Locating method to %s.
I agree to the use of my location information to view the weather forecast for my current location.
I agree to change the Locating method to %s to view the weather forecast for my current location.
Get weather alerts and badges on the Weather widget and in the app.
Get weather alerts and badges on the Weather widget, in the app, and on the Edge screen.
We recommend you update via Wi-Fi. Using your mobile network may result in additional charges.
Check your network connection and try again.
Tap here to restore weather data from your old device.
Tap RETRY to try to find your location again.
Turn on Location to get the local weather.
The latest version is already installed.
This will also be applied to notifications and Calendar.
To continue, agree to our updated %s.

"To get local weather, your current location will be sent to the weather services provider. (Please see the provider’s %1$sTerms and Conditions%2$s and %3$sPrivacy Policy%4$s). Other apps and services on your device may access the retrieved weather data to show the weather in those apps. In order to provide you with continuing weather information, Weather will have access to your location, even when you are not using the app."
To use this feature, you need to allow %s to access your location all the time and turn on Use precise location. Tap Settings, then go to Permissions > Location.
"Couldn't check for updates. Try again later."

"To get local weather, your current location will be sent to the weather services provider. (Please see the provider’s %1$sprivacy policy%2$s.) Other apps and services on your device may access the retrieved weather data to show the weather in those apps."

"To get local weather, your current location will be sent to the weather services provider. (Please see the provider’s %1$sprivacy policy%2$s.) Other apps and services on your device may access the retrieved weather data to show the weather in those apps. In order to provide you with continuing weather information, Weather will have access to your location, even when you are not using the app."

"Your current location will be collected and used to provide some of the Weather app features, such as getting your local weather. Other apps and services on your device may access the retrieved weather data to show the weather in those apps. In order to provide you with continued weather information, this app will regularly process your location, even when you are not using the app. By pressing Agree, you are agreeing to the collection and processing of your location for the above purposes. You can turn off using your location by going into the Weather app settings."

"Please read carefully before using “Weather” : If you want to know the weather of your current location, you will need to permit the third party service provider to have continuous (even when you are not using the service) access to your device and acquire certain data, as listed below. Please read carefully and understand the third party service provider’s %1$sTerms and Conditions%2$s and %3$sPrivacy Policy%4$s before giving such permission. You may withdraw your permission by turning off “Location” in the Settings menu. Other apps and services on your device may access the retrieved weather data to show the weather in those apps and services."

"Your current location will be collected and used to provide some of the Weather app features, such as getting your local weather.
In order to provide continuous weather info, this app will regularly process your location, even when you're not using the app. By continuing, you agree to the collection and processing of your location for the above purposes.
You can stop this location collection and usage in the Weather app settings."
To provide weather information for your current location
Current location information will be removed.
"%s values aren't available in other countries."
Wait for your data to finish being restored, then try again.
This app can read weather information.
Weather information not available for selected location.
Only Units, Auto refresh, and Use current location are synced.

"Can't use Dark mode while using a theme."
Automatically switch to a dark theme when Night mode is on.
You can adjust the Weather widget background color and transparency in settings.
Swipe the widget on your Home screen up or down to see information about other cities.
Your report to change your current city name from %1$s to %2$s will be sent.
Your location information and changes to the current city name will be sent to the weather content provider.
